E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 2/6/1984
Subject: Your offer sounds good
I have to admit that I like your offer.
So far, it's the best one I've received.

Regards,
Ernest Webb



Date: Friday, 2/7/1984
Subject: Thank you, I'll sign!
Your contract offer is really what I'm looking for.
I'm looking forward to playing with Toledo!

Regards,
Ernest Webb



Date: Saturday, 4/12/1984
Subject: Trade offer
Dear Sir,
I would like to offer you following trade:
LF Oscar Rodriguez
in return for
SP William Eyman, SP Orlando Arellano, MR Paul Ruhl.

Please let me know if you accept!

Best Regards,
Capital City GM



Date: Saturday, 4/19/1984
Subject: Gary Freeman healing process
Gary Freeman is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1984
Subject: Progress of Tim Gruber
Dear Sir,
Tim Gruber has an AVG of .355 at AA Sticky Wicketts!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Progress of Jack Messer

He has an ERA of 1.37, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Regards,
Scouting Director
